Review Name: Fair Review Description: Image and features given by flipkart is not genuine, this particular AC is shown with 4 way cooling flow ,which is totally incorrect, this function is not available in this unit ,I struggled four days to find it,after technician visit ,by the time I came to know . return period was over,,moreover AC outdoor unit found tempered ,better to move to local market for such a costly product ,never believe on e commerce sites ,they pose false features most of the time.and not ready to take liability afterwards.
